content: **41 x 46 throw in lion brand #790 homespun or #791 holiday homespun** *the only thing more satisfying than this fast crochet is wrapping up in it when you re done lion brand yarn * skill level easy level 2 gauge 3 v-stitches + 4 row = 8 in 20 3 cm with 4 strands of yarn held together #790 homespun or #791 holiday homespun 2 balls each of 4 colors 8 balls total crochet hook - size s-35 speed hook 19 mm pattern v_stitch 1-row repeat throw is worked with 1 strand each of 4 different colors held together throughout *because of the texture of homespun the fringe will fray when cut if you prefer a non-frayed look you can knot the ends knit or crochet a fringe or use hairspray or fray checktm by dritz® * available on lionbrand com in different colorways #790 homespun with fringe 80217ad 2 2005 *olive apple green dusty blue meadow* #790 homespun with fringe 80218ad 3 2005 *lagoon antique fuchsia grape* #791 holiday homespun no fringe 80937ad 4 2009 *starlight berry wreath mistletoe* *ravelry 5-1/2 hour throw patterns in lion brand yarn * vanna s choice 6 s-35 19 mm hook vanna s choice tv lapghan 7 q-19 15 75 mm hook jiffy 8 wool-ease thick & quick 9 homespun or holiday homespun see ravelry tv lapghan #70377ad #70378ad 11 for a larger version in homespun 2 https //cdn accentuate io/4679068418141/12378270040157/crochet-pattern-5-1-2-hour-throw-80217ad-v1591737471523 pdf 3 http //www lionbrand com/patterns/80218ad html 4 https //www lionbrand com/products/crochet-pattern-holiday-throw-1 5 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/5-1-2-hour-throw 6 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/5-1-2-hour-throw-2 7 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/5-1-2-hour-throw---tv-lapghan 8 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/5-1-2-hour-throw-3 9 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/5-1-2-hour-throw-4 10 http //www joann com/merry-mistletoe-crochet-throw/p370781 html 11 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/tv-lapghan-70377ad-70378ad
